mahesh abepala (trayiko intarnashanal kalamanakaru), lalith jayasekara (shri lanka subasadhaka sangamaye sabhapathi), tenisan da silwa (shri lanka wyaparika sangamaye sabhapathi), pantalin perera (shri lanka subasadhaka aramudal raskirime niyojya sabhapathi), jorch bandula (shri lanka sambandhikarana kamituwe sabhapathi) yana mahathwarun chayarupala dakwena athara, mema bakmaha sanakeliya sarthaka kara ganimata wishala meheyak daruwo wethi.

mehidi mema aayathana nipunatha sanwardhana amathyanshaya yatathata ho eeta samagami aayathana wana wruththiya puhunu aayathanaya ho jathika tharuna sewa sabhawata pawara gena nawa wada piliwelak yatathe wadath paladayi lesa nisi baladhariyekuge sruju adhikshanayen pa්rathiwyuhagatha kirimath, idikirim kshetha්rayata adala sammatha piriwithara ha anekuth pa්ramithikaranayan sha්ri lanka pa්ramithi karyanshayata pawarimath, idikirim kontha්rathkaruwan liyapadinchiya, upadeshanaya, idikirim aarakshana aramudala, pa්rasampadana regulasi sakasima ha punarikshanaya, aarawul wisadima yanadiya athulathwa idikirim kshetha්rayata adala jathika pa්rathipaththimaya thindu thirana ganima ha rajya upadeshanaya idikirim niyamana komisam sabhawakata pawarimath, sawsiripaya godanagilla tawar hol ra`gahala padanamata nawatha labadima haraha ema padanama magin kerena sewawa pupal kara ganimata iwahal wimath wadath paladayi wanu athayi mama wishwasa karami.
